import React from"react";import{Link}from"react-router-dom";import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";export const ArticleHelper=_ref=>{let{title,subtitle,technologies=[],links={},slug}=_ref;const content=/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"article-helper",children:[title&&/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h1",{className:"article-title",children:title}),subtitle&&/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h2",{className:"article-subtitle",children:subtitle}),technologies.length>0&&/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("p",{className:"article-technologies",children:["Using: ",technologies.join(", ")]}),links.github&&/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("p",{className:"article-links",children:["Repository: ",/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("a",{href:links.github,children:links.github})]})]});return slug?/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Link,{to:"/articles/".concat(slug),className:"article-link-wrapper",children:content}):content;};
